descriptionMdByRank.1: Increases ATK by **12%**. Every time Intro Skill or Resonance Liberation is cast, Resonance Skill DMG Bonus increases by **48%** for 5s.

descriptionMdByRank.4: Increases ATK by **21%**. Every time Intro Skill or Resonance Liberation is cast, Resonance Skill DMG Bonus increases by **84%** for 5s.
descriptionMdByRank.5: Increases ATK by **24%**. Every time Intro Skill or Resonance Liberation is cast, Resonance Skill DMG Bonus increases by **96%** for 5s.
